items.name: Ashbury Sweater
items.info: This is a mock-neck, half-zip sweater with an oversized fit. It's knit with soft, classic cotton yarn.

items.name: COZYAF Boyfriend Wide Sweatpant
items.info: These are high-rise, wide-leg sweatpants with a roomy boyfriend fit and a cinchable drawcord waistband. They're made with Tna’s COZYAF fleece — a premium fleece with a sueded face, brushed back and cloud-nine cozy feel.

items.name: Melrose T-Shirt
items.info: This is a cropped tee with a shrunken body and a notched crew neckline. It's made with soft waffle-knit fabric.

items.name: Greenwich Pant
items.info: These are high-rise, workwear-inspired pants with back patch pockets and a hammer loop detail. They're made with structured and substantial cotton twill.

items.name: Tour Longsleeve
items.info: This is a crew-neck longsleeve with a boxy silhouette. It's made with high-twist 100% cotton. Garment Dye (Gd) Colours: The unique colour of our garment dye is achieved through a special process — instead of dyeing the fabric, we dye the finished garment for a dimensional, washed-down look and soft feel. Results vary from one piece to the next, so yours is truly one-of-a-kind.

items.name: Acre Robe
items.info: This is a robe-style hooded jacket with a self-belt. It's made with soft, merino wool that's been boiled for a unique, felted texture.

items.name: Baja Dress
items.info: This is a long-sleeve, mock-neck dress with a thigh slit and a back-cutout detail. It's made from drapey Japanese satin.
